summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: AIKIMUSE Eyebrow Pen BRUNETTE Review Date: 2020/01/10 Store: AIKIMUSE Average Rating: 2.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AIKIMUSE', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.58 x 4 x 0.75 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} Review Text: This product started off promising but after one eye the color stopped coming out. Also the delineation between the four prongs blended into one.
It could have been better but sadly it's not working. Review Title: Started off good but Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: QIC 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara, Fiber Mascara, Waterproof Mascara, Natural Thick Thickening and Lengthening Mascara Lasting All Day, Waterproof, Smudge Proof Eyelashes Review Date: 2020/02/06 Store: Joruby Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Waterproof', 'Brand': 'Joruby', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 2 x 1 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Review Text: I'm always looking for a good mascara that will make my lashes appear thicker and longer. I thought this product worked well. Some other fiber mascara 's have various steps to achieve this while this is a one step process. I do find d the fiber mascara to be thicker and sticker than traditional mascara 's.
Although this does have a faint odor it worked well Review Title: Good but a little smelly Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Purple Hair Mask for Blonde with Keratin & Jojoba Oil - Platinum & Silver Hair - Instantly Eliminate Brassiness & Yellows - Made in USA - Hair Toner - Bleached & Highlighted Hair - Sulfate Free - 8 oz Review Date: 2020/07/09 Store: WELLUTION Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'WELLUTION', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Dry,Color-treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating Treatment', 'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 2.9 x 2.8 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '749715278440'} Review Text: I’m outside a lot in the summer and my hair sees a lot of sun and chlorine from the pool. It’s also becoming lighter with more grey. I was excited about trying this. I’ve used it for a few days and adult didn’t notice a huge change in the tone. It does feel somewhat softer though
I’m also not a fan of the packaging. There isn’t a pump or squeeze bottle. You just stick your hand in the jar. Review Title: Not a change in tone Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: PHOERA 30ml Foundation Liquid Full Coverage 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer (Nude & Buff Beige) with 6ml Makeup Face Primer & Kabuki Foundation Brush Flat Top Review Date: 2020/09/13 Store: SIGHTLING Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.18 x 0.79 x 1.18 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '779296966696'} Review Text: I really liked the look and feel of this foundation. It went on easily for a full coverage smooth look. I usually use a sponge when applying foundation but I really liked the easy of the brush. The only downside is that neither color worked. Review Title: Great coverage Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LAPOTHICELL Blemish Out Serum 55mL, Blemish care, soothing care, for brighten & luminous skin Review Date: 2020/11/15 Store: LAPOTHICELL Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.65 x 1.65 x 4.13 inches; 3.77 Ounces'} Review Text: I've been using this for about a week a cm I know it usually takes about 21 days to see a change but I'm hopeful that the positive results will continue. I have sun damage spots and I'm hoping to diminish them for a more even skin tone. This product is easy to use. You use the dropper and spread the product on you face. I like to use at night after washing my face but I suppose you can use it in the morning if you prefer. It does go on a little sticky but it dries quickly. Review Title: Refreshing Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LUXAZA 6 PCS Purple Eyeshadow Stick,Light Shimmer Cream Eyeshadow Crayon,Pro Smoky Waterproof & Long Lasting Eyeshadow Stick Set Review Date: 2020/12/17 Store: LUXAZA Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LUXAZA', 'Item Form': 'Crayon,Cream Eyeshadow', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '5.83 x 5 x 0.87 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: These are fun and easy to use. I like that color easily apply the color I want quickly. The colors aren't my cuppa but I can work with them. I was able to blend with a more neutral shade to get the perfect look that I wanted. Review Title: A good eyeshadow pencil Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Rancco Dried Flower Buds Fragrant Petals Ball, 10 Kinds Natural Organic Flowers Ball, Premium Grade Dried Blooming Flower Tea Balls for Tea, Baking or Bath Bombs Review Date: 2021/01/04 Store: Rancco Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Rancco', 'Scent': 'Honey, Rose, Lily', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 6.26 x 1.1 inches; 3.88 Ounces'} Review Text: I was excited for the petal balls but they left me wanting more. They arrived in a brown bag and were smaller than I anticipated -about 1" around. All the petal balls are in color foil. The smell isn't the best and they aren't labeled so I was unsure what flower ball I was using. These could really be a wow in a bathroom or add to your bath time enjoyment if they were larger, had a better smell and you could tell which petal ball you were using. Review Title: Could be better Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lenghthening Mascara by Almay,Volume & Lift, Eye Makeup, Hypoallergenic and Fragrance Free, 010 Blackest Black, 0.24 Fl Oz Review Date: 2021/03/11 Store: Almay Product Description: ['Enjoy visibly longer, lifted lashes in one gentle swipe with Almay Length & Lift Mascara™. Our clean, flake-free formula is enriched with a lash-caring complex of plant-based waxes and hair conditioners that nourish for healthy looking eyelashes. Plus, the brush is made of 100% plant-derived bristles that are designed to evenly coat and separate lashes from root to tip. We also ensured that our newest mascara is smooth and buildable—no clumps or smudging—making it the perfect finishing touch to any look, be it everyday glam, a smoky eye, or cat eye. What’s more, we tested our product to ensure it is suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers, so go ahead and magnify lashes to your chosen intensity! And because we love the environment as much as we love your delicate eyes, part of the mascara packaging is made with post-consumer recycled materials. Formulated without added parabens, phthalates, SLS, mineral oil, DMDM Hydantoin, formaldehydes, and Triclosan. As always, hypoallergenic. Ophthalmologist tested. Clean. Cruelty free. Fragrance free.'] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Color': '010 Blackest Black', 'Product Benefits': 'Conditioning', 'Special Feature': 'Not-Applicable', 'Material Type Free': 'Fragrance Free', 'Brand': 'Almay', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 0.73 x 5.75 inches; 1.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '7257548001', 'UPC': '309970143022', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/REVL7'} Review Text: This mascara works great. It lengths your lashes without clumping. I love that its hypoallergenic. There are a few brands that bother my eyes, especially during allergy season. The very black is perfect for framing my eyes Review Title: Works great Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:

First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. What’s more, we tested our product to ensure it is suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers, so go ahead and magnify lashes to your chosen intensity! And because we love the environment as much as we love your delicate eyes, part of the mascara packaging is made with post-consumer recycled materials. raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analyzed purchase history reveals a consumer with a mixed sentiment towards beauty products, showing a trend of seeking reliable performance and quality, especially in cosmetics aimed at enhancing facial features. Ratings fluctuate, indicating variable satisfaction; for example, while mascaras received higher ratings for effectiveness and ease of use, other products like eyebrow pens and hair masks did not meet expectations.

Common themes include a focus on makeup products that offer convenience and performance, such as single-step application for mascara and full coverage in foundation. However, there is a notable struggle with product quality, as seen in the dissatisfaction with some products' effectiveness, packaging, and scent.

This consumer appears price-sensitive, willing to try affordable options but increasingly frustrated with inadequate results. For instance, the mixed ratings on hair masks and eyebrow products show a desire for effective solutions that justify their cost. 

Overall, the core preferences indicate a pursuit of multi-functional beauty products that deliver tangible results without causing irritation, with a preference for hypoallergenic formulations. Furthermore, there is a distinct inclination toward products with better usability and packaging, suggesting a desire for user-friendly designs.

target_interaction.title: Smells great!
target_interaction.text:
I'm slowly turning gray and always looking for shampoo and conditioner's to stop the brassy tones. I thought this Lux Spa shampoo and conditioner set worked well to keep the brassiness at bay. This also smells great. I washed my hair in the morning and could still smell the fresh scent at night.
It also kept my hair soft and managable.
target_interaction.title_meta: Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - No, Orange, Yellow or Brassy Tones - Best Toner Treatment for Brassiness - Blonde, Grey, Bleached or Silver Hair - Sulfate Free
